website_summaries.verdict: Stunning picture quality and a high refresh rate make this make this model the perfect choice for sports, gaming, and action movies. You'll pay for the cutting edge technology, though.
pros: Combination of ultra HD image clarity with high contrast, color, and detail
Native 120 Hz refresh rate pairs with Motionflow XR provides blur-free action scenes
cons: Design tilts the screen back slightly, which is not noticeable when mounted to a wall but may be slightly noticeable on a stand

customer_reviews.title: prepare to have your mind blown
customer_reviews.text: The world is different now, for I have seen the future. AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Professor Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Best picture, EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I put off buying this TV for a year - - - feel like an idiot now because the quality of the picture is totally worth the money. I even like the "easel" form factor. The picture quality has spoiled me. ( and I had a top of the line Sony Bravia LED before this ) Negatives: the 'smart' features and the Android OS is very poor. I use it as a dumb monitor, unconnected to the internet. I play all my content through connected Blu-ray players or Apple TV. Did I mention that the picture is spectacular?
customer_reviews.author: T. Kilbourne

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have converted from Samsung to Sony. This is top notch viewing pleasure.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: We placed it in our den. The TV has great color and the features it has a super. The only thing I have to learn about is what headphones can be used with it without stopping the sound from the speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Enes M. Craft

customer_reviews.title: Great quality....
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the new world with this 4K TV. It's prefect to play PS4 Pro games on this TV... Who can touch me?
customer_reviews.author: MAMSEIN :D

customer_reviews.title: Sony XBR 65-A9F
customer_reviews.text: excellent tv, still making custom adjustments to it. Can't make any comments until the adjustments are made and applied to various scenes.
customer_reviews.author: ymw

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a wonderful plasm TV with this, and couldn't be happier. Deep rich colors, very detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Devin House

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: The TV came promptly as ordered. It has the best picture I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: N Fen

customer_reviews.title: SONY INTRODUCED ITS MASTER SERIES HDTV---THE 4K HDTV OF THE FUTURE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE MOST ADVANCED HDTV YOU CAN PURCHASE. THIS IS MY 12TH SONY TV SINCE 1981, AND I MAKE SURE I COMPARE OTHERS TO SONY, BEFORE MAKING A PURCHASE. AS THE OLD SONY AD ONCE STATED, "SONY NO BALONEY." SONY MAKES THE BEST, WITH THE EPITOME OF THE HIGHEST QUALITY COMPONENTS AVAILABLE, AND THIS IS THE UNMITIGATED TRUTH ABOUT THE NEW 4K MASTER SERIES.
customer_reviews.author: Prescott L. Wadsworth

customer_reviews.title: Late arriving but worth it.......WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just about the same overall size as my old Sony 52 inch. It's all screen, whereas the old set had and frame and speakers built in on the sides. I immediately turned on a football game and was mesmerized by the picture. My wife watch football just to enjoy the picture. So many features that it will take me a while to learn it all.
customer_reviews.author: Tim W. Skalland

customer_reviews.title: BURN IN
customer_reviews.text: A GREAT TV--EXCEPT FOR THE EASY BURN IN. MY FIRST 2017 M0DEL OLED LASTED 1 YEAR BEFORE 5 GREEN 1" BARS ACROSS BOTTOM OF TV APPEARED. MY REPLACEMENT A 2018 MODEL OLED LASTED 8 MONTHS BEFORE THE SAME GREEN BARS APPEARED WITH A BIG GREEN SPOT ABOUT 20" IN DIAMETER IN THE CENTER AREA OF SCREEN . MY 3RD REPLACEMENT A SONY X950G 55"--BACK TO OLDER TECH--WILL SEE HOW LONG IT LASTS.. NOTE: TV 'S WERE NEVER IN A PAUSE MODE BECAUSE OF BURN IN FEARS.
customer_reviews.author: ANTONELLI

product_meta.title: Sony Bravia XBR65A9F 65" 4K UHD OLED Android TV (2018 Model)
product_meta.description: Mastery of picture quality is achieved through peerless performance. The picture Processor x1 Ultimate and Pixel contrast booster Technology work together for an unprecedented union of bright, vibrant colors, absolute black, and stunning contrast with 4K HDR clarity. Acoustic Surface audio+ brings 3. 2 Channel sound from the screen. Introducing the master Series: the best of Sony.
feature_bullets: Master Series TVs are meticulously engineered for excellence with the latest and greatest in TV technology. Stand Width- Approx. 15.6 inches
Everything is upscale to get close to 4K HDR with the picture Processor x1 ultimate and 4K X-Reality Pro. Ogled TV - 8 million self-illuminating pixels for deep black and color
Enjoy smooth and vibrant colors with TRILUMINOS Display & 4K HDR Super Bit Mapping. Pictures and sound in perfect harmony with Sony's Acoustic Surface audio+ technology

Smartphone connectivity: Chromecast built-in, screen mirroring(maracas), video & TV side view (iOS/Android). voice-control your TV with Alexa compatibility. Android TV with Google Assistant technology gives you a genius TV

Pairs 4K Ultra HD picture clarity with the contrast, color, and detail of high dynamic range (HDR) for the most lifelike picture. The OLED panel’s Native 120Hz refresh rate is enhanced by Motion flow XR gives you the fast moving action scenes with no motion blur
4K HDR, - HDR10, hog. Dolby vision for incredible detail and clarity. Inputs: 4 – HDMI, 2 - USB2. 0, 1 – USB3. 0, 1 – composite
Dimensions (W x H x D): TV without stand: 57 1/8 x 32 7/8 x 3 1/2(11/32) inch, with stand: 57 1/8 x 32 7/8 x 12 5/8 inch

In the box: voice remote control (rmf-tx220u), batteries (LR03), AC power cord spec (us, 2pin, flat blades, polarity), IR blaster (1-849-161-12), Operating instructions, Quick setup guide/ supplement cue (Gal), Table top stand (separate, Assemble required)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars38 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
